en.title: Recommended Cat Grooming Supplies: Essential and Handy Items
en.content:
Here is a summary of grooming supplies needed for cat care. You don't need to get everything at once, but make sure to have the basics ready.

Basic Grooming Supplies

ItemPurposeFrequency
Slicker brushRemoving loose fur and detangling2-3 times per week
CombFinishing and checking for mats2-3 times per week
Cat nail clippersNail careOnce every 2-3 weeks
Cat toothbrushOral careDaily if possible
Ear cleanerEar cleaning1-2 times per month
Cat shampooCoat cleansingAs needed

Handy Additional Items

A Furminator (for undercoat removal), styptic powder (just in case during nail trimming), pet wipes (for wiping eye discharge), and cat grass (for hairball care) are also good to have for peace of mind.

zh.title: 猫咪护理用品推荐清单：必备品和便利小物
zh.content:
整理了猫咪护理所需的用品清单。不需要一次性全部购齐，但基本物品还是要提前准备好。

基本护理用品

物品用途频率
针梳去除浮毛和解开打结每周2-3次
排梳整理和检查毛球每周2-3次
猫用指甲剪指甲护理每2-3周1次
猫用牙刷口腔护理尽量每天
洁耳液耳朵清洁每月1-2次
猫用洗毛液毛发清洁需要时使用

实用的辅助用品

去底绒梳（去除底层绒毛）、止血粉（剪指甲时以防万一）、湿巾（擦拭眼屎）、猫草（毛球护理）等也建议备上，让您更加安心。
